query.example:
SELECT
  states.state,
  last_updated_ts
FROM
  states
  INNER JOIN states_meta ON
    states.metadata_id = states_meta.metadata_id
WHERE
  states_meta.entity_id = 'sun.sun'
ORDER BY
  last_updated_ts DESC
LIMIT
  10;
